Interface PickupRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PickupEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PickupEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<PickupEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<PickupEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<PickupEntity, Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<PickupEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PickupEntity, Long>
@Repository public interface PickupRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<PickupEntity, Long>

  • Method Details

    • findByOfferId

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.offer.id = :offerId") Optional<PickupEntity> findByOfferId(@Param("offerId") String offerId)
      Find pickup by offer ID

    • findByUserIdWithDetails

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p JOIN FETCH p.offer o JOIN FETCH o.user JOIN FETCH o.listing l JOIN FETCH l.creator WHERE p.createdBy.id = :userId OR o.user.id = :userId OR l.creator.id = :userId ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC") List<PickupEntity> findByUserIdWithDetails(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get all pickups for a user (both created by and involved in)

    • findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<PickupEntity> findByUserIdOrderByCreatedAtDesc(@Param("userId") Long userId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Get paginated pickups for a user

    • findByCreatedByIdWithDetails

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p JOIN FETCH p.offer o JOIN FETCH o.user JOIN FETCH o.listing l JOIN FETCH l.creator WHERE p.createdBy.id = :userId ORDER BY p.createdAt DESC") List<PickupEntity> findByCreatedByIdWithDetails(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get pickups created by a user

    • findByStatusWithDetails

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p JOIN FETCH p.offer o JOIN FETCH o.user JOIN FETCH o.listing l JOIN FETCH l.creator WHERE p.status = :status ORDER BY p.createdAt ASC") List<PickupEntity> findByStatusWithDetails(@Param("status") com.uninaswap.common.enums.PickupStatus status)
      Get pickups by status

    • findByStatusAndUserIdWithDetails

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.status = :status AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.createdAt ASC") List<PickupEntity> findByStatusAndUserIdWithDetails(@Param("status") com.uninaswap.common.enums.PickupStatus status, @Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get pickups by status for a specific user

    • findUpcomingPickupsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedTime IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedDate >= CURRENT_DATE AND p.status IN ('PENDING', 'ACCEPTED') AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.selectedDate ASC, p.selectedTime ASC") List<PickupEntity> findUpcomingPickupsByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("now") LocalDateTime now)
      Get upcoming pickups - those with selected date/time in the future

    • findPastPickupsByUserId

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedTime IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedDate < CURRENT_DATE AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.selectedDate DESC, p.selectedTime DESC") List<PickupEntity> findPastPickupsByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("now") LocalDateTime now)
      Get past pickups - those with selected date/time in the past

    • countByStatusAndUserId

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(p) FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.status = :status AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId)") long countByStatusAndUserId(@Param("status") com.uninaswap.common.enums.PickupStatus status, @Param("userId") Long userId)
      Count pickups by status for a user

    • findByDateRangeAndUserId

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.selectedDate ASC, p.selectedTime ASC") List<PickupEntity> findByDateRangeAndUserId(@Param("startDate") LocalDate startDate, @Param("endDate") LocalDate endDate, @Param("userId") Long userId)
      Find pickups scheduled within a date range (for those with selected dates)

    • existsByOfferIdAndStatus

      boolean existsByOfferIdAndStatus(String offerId, com.uninaswap.common.enums.PickupStatus status)
      Check if pickup exists for offer

    • deleteByOfferId

      void deleteByOfferId(String offerId)
      Delete pickup by offer ID

    • findPickupsNeedingReminder

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedTime IS NOT NULL AND (p.selectedDate = :todayDate OR p.selectedDate = :tomorrowDate) AND p.status = 'ACCEPTED'") List<PickupEntity> findPickupsNeedingReminder(@Param("todayDate") LocalDate todayDate, @Param("tomorrowDate") LocalDate tomorrowDate)
      Find confirmed pickups that need reminder notifications (24 hours before)

    • findUpcomingConfirmedPickups

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedTime IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedDate >= CURRENT_DATE AND p.status = 'ACCEPTED' AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.selectedDate ASC, p.selectedTime ASC") List<PickupEntity> findUpcomingConfirmedPickups(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("now") LocalDateTime now)
      Get upcoming confirmed pickups (with selected date/time)

    • findPendingPickupSelection

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.status = 'PENDING' AND (p.createdBy.id = :userId OR p.offer.user.id = :userId OR p.offer.listing.creator.id = :userId) ORDER BY p.createdAt ASC") List<PickupEntity> findPendingPickupSelection(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      Get pickups pending date/time selection

    • findConfirmedPickupsNeedingReminder

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.selectedDate IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedTime IS NOT NULL AND p.selectedDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND p.status = 'ACCEPTED'") List<PickupEntity> findConfirmedPickupsNeedingReminder(@Param("startDate") LocalDate startDate, @Param("endDate") LocalDate endDate)
      Find pickups with selected times needing reminders

    • findByOfferIdAndStatus

      @Query("SELECT p FROM PickupEntity p WHERE p.offer.id = :id AND p.status = :status") List<PickupEntity> findByOfferIdAndStatus(@Param("id") String id, @Param("status") com.uninaswap.common.enums.PickupStatus status)
      Find pickups by offer ID and status
      Parameters:
      id - Offer ID
      pending - Status to filter by
      Returns:
      List of pickups matching the criteria
